p: Viral RNA was extracted from plasma samples using a QIAamp Viral RNA Minikit (Qiagen). RNA extracted from plasma samples was reverse transcribed and amplified by one-step RT-PCR using a set of 4 pan-HIV-1 primer set designed for the amplification of HIV-1 genomes of all groups and subtypes [ 25]. Amplicons were pooled for Illumina library preparation and sequenced applying next-generation sequencing on the Illumina MiSeq at the Wellcome Trust Sanger Institute (Cambridge) as previously described [ 29].
